Naruto creates a [[shadow clone]] which he grabs and transforms into a [[fūma shuriken]] that he throws at his enemy. After it hits the enemy the shuriken turns back to a shadow clone and punches the enemy in the face. This can also be done to escape attacks.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm]]'' and ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Generations]]'', before Naruto throws the shuriken, he [[Combination Transformation|combines]] with the shuriken. When the Fūma Shuriken makes contact, it slashes the opponent several times, then turns back to Naruto and the shadow clone. Both of them deliver a combo attack that sends the opponent flying off into the distance.
* In ''Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Generations'' and ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3]]'', this technique is only usable in story mode, before Naruto learned [[Rasengan]].
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]'', it appears as one of Part I Naruto's selectable Ninjutsu along with the [[Rasengan]].
